footer.slogan: Contact us - and your home will thank you!

home.title: Who Are We?
home.subtitle: ITSKOV STROY Ltd. is a renovation and remodeling company with a clear focus: professional, high-quality execution of your construction projects - from small improvements to complete transformations

paragraph.1: ITSKOV STROY Ltd. is a company focused on quality interior renovations, founded with a clear mission - to restore trust in reliable and responsible construction.
paragraph.2: We work with both individuals and businesses alike, offering a full range of services for apartments, houses, and commercial properties.

points.1: In a world where 'renovation' is often associated with delays, compromises, and unnecessary stress - we choose a different path.
points.2: A team that works with responsibility, dedication, and a personal approach.
points.3: We don't make promises we can't keep.
points.4: We value clear communication, honesty, and the highest quality in every service we provide.

1.title: Your Time is Money
1.text: We organize the entire process quickly and without unnecessary hassle.
details: We coordinate all craftsmen and stages of the renovation for you
We save you the trouble of searching for separate specialists
We work according to a plan and schedule to avoid surprises
Minimum effort on your side - maximum results

2.title: Quality Without Compromise
2.text: Long-lasting, high-quality solutions with attention to every detail.
details: We use proven materials and technologies
Each stage is carefully inspected before moving forward
We aim for a finished result that lasts for years
Attention to detail - from hidden installations to final touches

3.title: Integrity Without Exceptions
3.text: We work precisely and keep every promise we make.
details: No hidden costs or changes without your approval
We value trust - your peace of mind is our priority

4.title: Deadlines and Accessibility
4.text: Always on time and always available for you.
details: We meet agreed deadlines without unnecessary delays
We adapt to your time and schedule
You will always get an answer to any question or concern
We remain available for consultations and support even after the project is completed

intro.title: Our Services
intro.text: We offer flexible and high-quality solutions for home and office. From small improvements to complete renovations - we are with you every step of the way.

left.title: Complete and Partial Interior Renovations
left.description: If you need a total renovation - without searching for separate contractors for every task - we are here. And we offer:
left.text: You relax - we take care of everything else.

tasks: Full renovation from A to Z - planning, execution, finishing details
One organization, one team - saving you time and stress
Regular communication and reliability throughout the process
Completion on time and according to agreed parameters

left.title: Electrical Services
left.description: We follow all safety standards and provide the required documentation. We provide:
left.text: Safety, functionality, and good aesthetics - that's our standard.

tasks: Complete wiring for new or renovated properties
Replacement of electrical panels, sockets, switches, and lighting
Installation of concealed wiring with PVC channels or conduits
Diagnostics and troubleshooting

left.title: Plumbing Services
left.description: Everything is securely installed, pressure-tested, and inspected before completion. We offer:
left.text: Plumbing should be done once - but done right.

tasks: Replacement and installation of new plumbing systems
Installation of sinks, boilers, toilets, shower cabins, and more
Work with polypropylene, copper, and PVC pipes

left.title: Drywall
left.description: Drywall gives freedom for all kinds of interior solutions. With it we:
left.text: A perfect solution for modern interiors, insulation, and soundproofing.

tasks: Construct suspended ceilings, partition walls, concealed lighting
Create niches, shelves, decorative elements
Straighten uneven walls and ceilings
Install with durable constructions and strong plastering

left.title: Tile Installation
left.description: We perfect every detail, because in the bathroom there is no room for mistakes. We guarantee:
left.text: Tiles are not just cladding - they create style and comfort.

tasks: Installation of floor and wall tiles - bathroom, kitchen, hallway, terrace
Precise leveling and consistent grouting
Work with faience, terracotta, granite and mosaic tiles
Proper finishing of corners, trims, and transitions

left.title: Painting
left.description: We work fast and clean, so painting doesn't turn into a nightmare, but a pleasure. We offer:
left.text: With a new color, your home literally comes to life again.

tasks: Interior painting with latex, oil-based paint, decorative effects
Consultation on colors and combinations
Surface preparation - priming, plastering if needed
Clean and precise work - no drips or stains

left.title: Plastering
left.description: We use high-quality mixes and professional tools to achieve perfectly smooth walls and ceilings. We provide:
left.text: Beautiful walls start with a solid base.

tasks: Cement, gypsum, and fine plaster - depending on the wall type
Leveling and smoothing surfaces
Preparation for painting or wallpapering
Repair of cracks, uneven areas, and other defects

left.title: Floor Screed
left.description: We use high-quality materials that guarantee durability and long life of the floor covering. We provide:
left.text: A strong and level floor base is the start of every good renovation.

tasks: Machine and manual screed - depending on the room type and requirements
Precise floor leveling
Fast drying and the ability to step on it in a short time
Proper preparation for all types of flooring - tiles, parquet, laminate, vinyl

text.normal: Get in touch and take the first step toward your renewed home -

allProjects.title: Renovation and Repainting of Ceilings and Columns in Shopping Mall
allProjects.description: We carried out a complete refresh of the interior spaces in a large shopping mall, focusing primarily on the ceilings and columns. The work included surface preparation through sanding and plastering, removal of old coatings, and application of high-quality, long-lasting paints. For the columns, we used wear-resistant coatings to ensure durability and easy maintenance, while the ceilings were painted with white dispersion paint to create a brighter and more spacious look. The project was completed within a short timeframe and with minimal disruption to the operation of the retail stores. The final result is a modern, clean, and fresh appearance that enhances the overall experience of visitors.

allProjects.title: Office Space Redesign and Painting
allProjects.description: Complete interior redesign of a corporate office space. Includes modern color schemes, durable paints for high-traffic areas, and optimized lighting through reflective wall finishes.

allProjects.title: Residential Apartment Renovation
allProjects.description: Full renovation of a 3-bedroom apartment including repainting, flooring upgrades, and ceiling refinishing. Used eco-friendly paints for a safe and modern look.
